title: DosDogs
author: DosDogs
content: One of the best reminders I’ve seen to HODL https://twitter.com/devanwonders/status/1609657874325835776?s=46&t=PUOq3Z5D5w7Ib2nwi9ZVkwHe legit says all this   - btc is a garbage investment - youre an idiot- btc is beanie babies for tech bros- it’s at 6.5K go f yourself What other 2018/19 era clips are out there?

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: To be fair. He is just a stand up comedian and his show is about putting a humor on investment world which Bitcoin at that time is dumping hard. People will not laugh if he is shilling it hard to convince them to buy. Bitcoin that time is pretty popular so this kind of comedian is using it catalyst to there joke. He is not a financial adviser but rather a comedian. Laughing at his words and proving him a fool only serves his purpose on what’s his profession. Find words of popular influencers and analyst not a comedian that making a leaving for giving humor to people.I’m not defending him. It’s just criticizing his words is nonsense because it’s a joke for his show.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on January 03, 2023, 02:31:58 AMI’m not defending him. It’s just criticizing his words is nonsense because it’s a joke for his show.hahah you know the world run, people sometimes only cut some video share it on social media and make it viral without knowing the truth of the real  video isand yes there is actually 400+ bitcoin "dead" and still counted can be found here https://99bitcoins.com/bitcoin-obituaries/

comments.author: GideonGono
comments.body: It is pretty common back then when Bitcoin was just starting to make a huge noise or name, Whenever the price go down there would be so many people who would act as T.A and predict that it would continue to crash or it is just a waste of investment.But it always come up and go higher when it starts to recover so I wonder if it would also happen this time, would we see another ATH when it starts to rise up again.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Bill Maher tells BTC jokes as well and he is anti-BTC and people laugh at those jokes too. He may still even if BTC stands still after this worse-ever crisis. It's just a joke but people are going to brand comedians with their remarks about it. The beauty of being a comedian is that even if they tend to be wrong, they could just say it's a joke.  Another cycle will pass in 2025 and $6500 is way behind and this video will keep floating every bear market to remind people.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: This is why many people fall to shitcoins because they're just believing what people are saying and don't do any depth research, not to mention that many newbies are taking serious with Elon Musk's joke. A comedian will try his best to make a joke that related with the current hype or situation, actually this also mean Hasan Minhaj is actually following Bitcoin price. I consider he's also invest in Bitcoin, that's why he know about it.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on January 03, 2023, 02:31:58 AMI’m not defending him. It’s just criticizing his words is nonsense because it’s a joke for his show.And it seems to have really aged well, hasn't it? Quote from: Despairo on January 03, 2023, 05:59:32 AMThis is why many people fall to shitcoins because they're just believing what people are saying and don't do any depth research, not to mention that many newbies are taking serious with Elon Musk's joke. A comedian will try his best to make a joke that related with the current hype or situation, actually this also mean Hasan Minhaj is actually following Bitcoin price. I consider he's also invest in Bitcoin, that's why he know about it.After the mega rug-pull that was OneCoin, and subsequent coins too but OneCoin really made a ton of people look like fools, how are people still chasing high yield coins and investments?

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: QuoteHistory Repeats ignore the FUD 2018 Netflix Show says BTC is garbage @ 6.5KNothing has changed in terms of what the mainstream media thinks about Bitcoin, and this is especially expressed at a time when the price of the same is losing value compared to fiat. I think that even today there are some extremely negative documentaries on that same streaming platform, and it does not surprise me personally.How many people believe what the famous "Oracle of Omaha" constantly preaches regarding Bitcoin? Quote from: https://www.cnbc.com/2018/05/05/warren-buffett-says-bitcoin-is-probably-rat-poison-squared.htmlWarren Buffett warned investors again not to invest in bitcoin.Bitcoin is “probably rat poison squared,” he said, according to CNBC’s Becky Quick. Buffett is presiding at Berkshire Hathaway’s 2018 annual shareholder meeting on Saturday.Quote from: https://www.cnbc.com/2014/03/14/buffett-blasts-bitcoin-as-mirage-stay-away.html“Stay away from it. It’s a mirage, basically,” he said on CNBC’s “Squawk Box” on Friday.

comments.author: FanEagle
comments.body: It's obvious that people will never understand the power of bitcoin if they do not look at the right place for it. Bitcoin is a strong idea and not just an asset, and that is why it will always be a strong asset as well if you do not fix fiat world.The world we live in before bitcoin and after with fiat is not acceptable and it's a horrible place, and that terrible conditions propelled people into crypto and they loved it. I understand not many people may like it at first but that doesn't mean that we are going to end up with something like that forever. I personally would love to see something better but that is not going to change anytime soon.
